name: Program shorter than 15 minutes has zero intervals
fullName: features/tv_intervals.feature:Program shorter than 15 minutes has zero intervals
description:
As a TV scheduling system
I want to automatically calculate 15-minute intervals for programs
So that I can track program duration in standardized time blocks
descriptionHtml:
As a TV scheduling system
I want to automatically calculate 15-minute intervals for programs

statusMessage:

assert 1 == 0

steps.name: Given I have a program "Weather Update" that runs from "12:00" to "12:10"
When I insert the program into the database
Then the program "Weather Update" should have 0 intervals
